name: Normal Mode
desc:
In Normal Mode, the recipe for the Tiny Potato (and therefore Galactic Potato) is reduced to less than a tenth of the default value. Generating flowers suffer passive decay after one real-world hour.

If playing on a server, you must choose the same Mode as the server owner. To return to this selection screen later, exit your game, then delete the playerschoice.marker file in your instance directory before restarting.

name: Hard Mode
desc:
In Hard Mode, the recipe for the Tiny Potato (and therefore Galactic Potato) is unchanged, and generating flowers decay after half of a real-world hour.

If playing on a server, you must choose the same Mode as the server owner. To return to this selection screen later, exit your game, then delete the playerschoice.marker file in your instance directory before restarting.
